backend/main.mo: Defines core hotel booking canister types, storage maps, admin principal, and initializes authorization and invite-link state.
feature_evidence.json: Contains feature evidence metadata linking features to frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Lists concise summaries for all frontend source files used in the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining OKLCH color tokens and light/dark theme variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting up the root element, favicon, meta tags, and script loader.
frontend/REGRESSION_CHECKLIST.md: Pre-release regression checklist covering auth, booking flows, payments, and UI validations.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app wiring routes, auth guards, and query client within the application shell.
frontend/src/buildInfo.ts: Exports the current build version constant v32.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminBooki: Displays all hotel bookings with status, totals, and details, handling loading, error, and empty states. Uses tables and dialogs to show booking info and hotel names.
frontend/src/components/admin/HotelVisib: Provides controls for toggling hotel activation and subscription status. Shows hotels in a table with actions for admins to update visibility.
frontend/src/components/admin/InviteToke: Manages creation and listing of invite tokens tied to hotel principals. Allows generating new tokens and copying existing ones.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Shows an access-denied message based on user role and activation status, with navigation options. Displays activation form when a hotel user needs activation.
frontend/src/components/auth/GuardErrorS: Displays an error when permission checks fail, with options to retry or return home. Shows the underlying error message for debugging.
frontend/src/components/auth/HotelActiva: Handles validating and consuming invite tokens to activate hotel accounts. Updates relevant queries and redirects users after successful activation.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileComp: Shows a modal for new authenticated users to complete their profile and blocks access until a name is provided.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Ensures the user is authenticated via Internet Identity, showing a login prompt or loading state when needed.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireRole: Checks user role, admin status, and optional hotel activation before granting access, showing error or denied screens otherwise.
frontend/src/components/booking/BookingD: Displays detailed booking info in a dialog with optional guest principal copying and payment proof status.
frontend/src/components/booking/BookingF: Handles creating a booking with date validation, price calculation, and success confirmation.
frontend/src/components/booking/BookingS: Renders a badge showing a human‑readable booking status with appropriate styling.
frontend/src/components/booking/MyBookin: Lists the user’s bookings with hotel info, status, and quick access to view details.
frontend/src/components/common/ImagePrev: Shows a fullscreen dialog containing a large preview of an image with a close button.
frontend/src/components/debug/AuthDiagno: Debug UI showing identity, principal, role, admin status, and hotel profile load state using various query hooks.
frontend/src/components/hotel/HotelBooki: Displays hotel bookings, handles loading/errors, groups pending and confirmed bookings, and allows confirming pending bookings.
frontend/src/components/hotel/HotelPayme: Manages hotel payment methods, allowing adding and removing methods with form controls and query hooks.
frontend/src/components/hotel/HotelProfi: Editable hotel profile form for name, location, address, map link, and contacts, with update and refetch logic.
frontend/src/components/hotel/RecordStay: Placeholder panel indicating stay‑recording is unavailable until backend support is added.
frontend/src/components/hotel/RoomPhotos: Renders room photo galleries with fallback handling, compact/full modes, and image‑error tracking.
frontend/src/components/hotel/RoomsPanel: UI panel for creating and editing hotel rooms, handling image uploads, form state, and submission via API hooks.
frontend/src/components/hotel/Subscripti: Displays hotel subscription status with badges and alerts, and shows admin contact card when activation is needed.
Defines the main app layout with top navigation, content area, and footer showing build info.
frontend/src/components/nav/LanguageSele: Single-language selector component that manages locale state through context.
frontend/src/components/nav/TopNav.tsx: Top navigation bar showing links based on authentication, admin status, and hotel activation, plus login/logout controls.
frontend/src/components/payments/Contact: Admin contact card for hotel activation and subscription, including WhatsApp, email, and payment method info.
frontend/src/components/payments/HotelPa: Displays a hotel's accepted payment methods and contact options such as WhatsApp and email.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the current identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login state, including initializing, login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating backend data such as user roles, profiles, admin actions, and hotel info.
frontend/src/hooks/useRoomImageUpload.ts: Implements client-side room image upload handling using FileReader with progress tracking and data URL output.
frontend/src/i18n/LocaleContext.tsx: Provides a locale context with storage-backed language selection, currently supporting only 'en'.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup with custom CSS variables for theming in light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point configuring React Query and Internet Identity provider before rendering the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/AccountStatusPage.tsx: Displays user account status, roles, hotel access, and invite token actions with admin tools and refresh capabilities.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPanelPage.tsx: Admin dashboard page aggregating panels for invite tokens, hotel visibility, and booking management.
frontend/src/pages/BrowseHotelsPage.tsx: Lists available hotels with images, loading states, and room photo previews, allowing navigation to hotel details.
frontend/src/pages/GuestAccountPage.tsx: Guest account page showing booking management shortcuts and the bookings table.
frontend/src/pages/HotelAreaPage.tsx: Main hotel management interface with profile, rooms, payments, bookings, stays, and subscription tabs, including loading and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/HotelDetailPage.tsx: Shows detailed hotel info, rooms, and booking form based on hotelId, with loading and not‑found states.
frontend/src/pages/MainMenuPage.tsx: Landing menu letting users choose guest or hotel portals based on authentication and role status.
frontend/src/pages/MyBookingsPage.tsx: Page for users to view and manage their bookings with navigation shortcuts.
frontend/src/types/extended-backend.ts: Defines extended TypeScript interfaces and enums matching backend types for hotels, rooms, bookings, profiles, and queries.
frontend/src/utils/debugFlags.ts: Utility to detect whether debug mode is enabled via environment or URL param.
frontend/src/utils/money.ts: Money formatting helpers with currency symbols, names, and support checks.
frontend/src/utils/roomPictures.ts: Utilities for validating and filtering room picture URLs and tracking failed images.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters from query or hash, persist them in sessionStorage, and clear stored or hash-based parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, content paths, extended colors and animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animation.
project_state.json: Tracks the project's current feature state, regressions, and architectural notes for hotel profile, room creation, booking flow, and portal visibility.
